column4: has anyone gotten a wg111T wireless usb dongle to work with ubuntu?
yeah nickrud it works now :) was a bad burn
run lsusb, one line will identify the device, you can websearch for the identifier to gain how t oinstall it
my Netgear WG311T works out of the box since gutsy
and the name of the packages?
apt-get will manage that for you
sudo apt-get --purge remove packagename; sudo apt-get --purge autoremove
router turned off, break in cable, kernel dumps the driver, dhcp fail after lease expires
right click bar -> add item   add notifier
what do i right click on?
the bar you want to add to
if i right click anywhere on the notification bar, i get the preferences for the notifier at that spot
right click elsewhere, you will get a menu with "add item" eventually
yes, it will be in the right click menu
i never said you do, you will see "add item" in the right click menu, you will then see this: http://www.techotopia.com/images/f/f7/Gnome_add_to_panel2.jpg   you can then select notifier from there
